Featured-image: CJ108-mauve-pleated-bodice-evening-dress-with-cap-sleeve_p.jpg

Description: The pleated bodice is a V-neck that cascades into the floor length chiffon skirt. There is a pleated waist band that accents the waist. The deep V-neck and capped sleeves are embellished with bead work that shines.
